author: raul
msg: Fixed some typos, and all changes for J1.4 release.

author: bago
msg: Merged EhloHook to HeloHook (EhloCmdHandler reuse HeloHook extension point)
UsersRepositoryAuthHook now setRelayingAllowed to true on successfull auth
Removed verifyIdentity configuration from the handlerchain/configurationData: we can do this by enabling/disabling its specific Hook (SenderAuthIdentifyVerificationRcptHook).

author: rgreig
msg: QPID-32: new model for holding and processing message in memory to support new persistent stores
